TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program: The Kraken Edition

Articles.Content:
I been hearing alot from some outside sources about a Kraken Edition of the game.  No, it's not V1.1, but rather an extremely rare edition.

One very odd thing about this edition is the Kraken shows up randomly at any point of the game.  For instance, just trying to launch the rocket seizes away the controls and split the rocket apart.

There were also instances where once one reached orbit, the Kraken struck again.  Even crazy cases of space stations spontaneously increase in velocity and seize control, resulting in a crazy separation.

Only a few people seemed to have this ultra rare copy.

Yar, I seen the Kraken Edition. Twas only fer a brief moment before the version was auto updated and the Kraken Edition slipped away into the sea. But a moment twas all she needed to rip my ship apart, yar. My gravity turns never been the same since. Yar.
Not sure if this is real sure its not a Aprils fool joke?
I hear that if you download the pre-release from the store, your chances of getting the kracken edition are exponentially higher.

People who have been able to obtain this rare edition of the game are described as "packin' Kraken."

(everyone else is "lackin' Kraken")
I think that's whatever instance of KSP is installed on Whackjob's computer, right?

16 minutes ago, monstah said:

I think that's whatever instance of KSP is installed on Whackjob's computer, right?

Nope. @Whackjob's install would be the Giant Squid edition. Danny2462 has the Kraken edition.
